title: King's Ransom/Quick guide

properties.name: description
properties.value: Grab all the required items at the start. You do not have to make bank trips during this quest.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:King's Ransom/Quick guide
 This quick guide has an in-depth guide here.
It contains a more detailed description of dialogue, cutscenes, and storyline.

Details[edit | edit source]

Start point Talk to the Gossip, outside Sinclair Mansion.
Official difficultyExperienced
DescriptionLife has been quiet at the Sinclair Mansion since you discovered the murderer... too quiet. So quiet, in fact, that the family has gone! Suspicions are running high that the Sinclairs' recent departure is tied to the disappearance of King Arthur and his knights. But time is running short and clues are scarce, will you crack the case in time?
Official lengthMedium
Requirements
  • 45 Magic (not boostable)
  • 65 Defence (not boostable)
  • Completion of the following quests:
    • Black Knights' Fortress
    • Holy Grail
      • Merlin's Crystal
    • Murder Mystery
    • One Small Favour
      • Rune Mysteries
      • Druidic Ritual
      • Shilo Village
        • Jungle Potion
Items required
  • Granite (any size)
  • Telekinetic Grab runes (1 air rune and 1 law rune) (can be obtained during the quest)
  • Full black armour (Black full helm, platebody, and platelegs/plateskirt)—Note: Trimmed versions of black armour will work. (h) versions will not work
  • A bronze med helm (can be purchased from Peksa's Helmet Shop. in the Barbarian Village, or picked up inside Draynor Manor near the exit)
  • An Iron chainbody (Both the Iron Chainbody and the Bronze med helm can be bought upstairs in the Warrior Guild Armoury. If you can't access the Warriors' Guild you can get an Iron Chainbody from Wayne's Chains in Southern Falador, Horvik's Armour Shop in central Varrock, or the Grand Exchange)
  • Animate rock scroll (obtainable during the quest). Note: if you have it in your bank, either destroy it or take it with you. You won't be able to receive another from Wizard Cromperty otherwise.
Recommended
  • A teleport to Ardougne to talk to Wizard Cromperty
  • A teleport to Camelot for a quick access to Seers' Village and Camelot
  • A combat bracelet or amulet of glory for fast access to the Edgeville Monastery
  • A Dramen staff or Lunar staff with code cjr for quick travel to Sinclair Mansion
  • Salve graveyard teleports for quick access to fairy ring
Enemies to defeat None

(h) versions will '''not''' work\n*A [[bronze med helm]] (can be purchased from [[Peksa]]'s [[Helmet Shop.]] in the [[Barbarian Village]], or picked up inside [[Draynor Manor]] near the exit)\n*An [[Iron chainbody]] (Both the [[Iron Chainbody]] and the [[Bronze med helm]] can be bought upstairs in the [[Warrior Guild Armoury]]. If you can't access the [[Warriors' Guild]] you can get an [[Iron Chainbody]] from [[Wayne's Chains]] in Southern [[Falador]], [[Horvik's Armour Shop]] in central [[Varrock]], or the [[Grand Exchange]])\n*[[Animate rock scroll]] (obtainable during the quest). Note: if you have it in your bank, either destroy it or take it with you. You won't be able to receive another from [[Wizard Cromperty]] otherwise."}

Walkthrough[edit | edit source]

Sinclair's Mansion[edit | edit source]

Grab all the required items at the start. You do not have to make bank trips during this quest.

  • Speak with Gossip outside of Sinclair Mansion. ( 1)…
    1
  • Speak with the guard in the courtyard to the north.
  • Break into the Smashed Window on the East side of the mansion.
  • Grab the Scrap paper in the dining room next to the fire place (ground floor[UK]1st floor[US]).
  • Go up the stairs to the 1st floor[UK]2nd floor[US] and then to the library in the centre.
  • Take the Address Form off the table and read it.
  • Search the bookcase on the Western wall for a Black knight helm.
  • Return to the guard via the smashed window.
  • Speak to him, using all three options so that he takes each of your three items
  • Speak with the Gossip using all three options.

Anna's Trial[edit | edit source]

  • Travel south to the Seer's Village courthouse. (South-East of the bank).
  • Speak to Anna. ( 1)…
    1
  • Walk down the stairs to begin the trial.

For this part you need to speak to the Judge in order to call next witness and then speak to the witnesses to ask them questions.

  • Call the Dog Handler as a witness. Ask him about the poison.
  • Call the Butler as a witness by speaking to the judge. Ask him about the dagger.
  • Call the Maid as a witness. Ask her about the night of the murder.
  • Ask the Maid (or anyone else) about the thread.

(If done correctly Anna should be pronounced not guilty and balloons will fall.)

  • Exit the courtroom by clicking on the gate.
  • Speak again with Anna in her cell.

Camelot Castle's Prison[edit | edit source]

Items needed: Telekinetic grab runes

  • Head east around Camelot Castle, past the gate and to the north-east. Search the statue to start a cutscene.

Clicking anywhere will end the cutscene and you will need to go through it again.

  • Speak with Merlin inside the cell. ( 3)…
    3What do we do now?
  • Reach for the vent at the north of the cell.
  • Use Telekinetic Grab on the guard fixing his hair outside the cell
    • You can speak to the knights in the cell to receive a lockpick or runes for telekinetic grab.
  • Use the Hair clip or lockpick on the door to start a puzzle.
    • To complete this puzzle, you must set each of four tumblers to the correct height. The most foolproof way to do this (not necessarily the quickest) is to set all tumblers to the lowest height, and try the lock. If a tumbler shows a green circle, do not change that tumbler anymore (red and blue circles can be ignored). Increase the height by one on each other tumbler and try again. Continue until the lock unlocks. This method will take at most six attempts.
  • Climb up the staircases until you reach the top floor.
  • Search the table.
  • Choose the round purple box second from the right.

Black Knights' Fortress[edit | edit source]

Items needed: bronze med helm, iron chainbody, full black armour, granite, holy grail

  • Talk to Wizard Cromperty in Ardougne to receive an Animate rock scroll.
    • You might already have the item in your bank from the quest One Small Favour. However, you must still talk to Cromperty. Be sure to go through all dialogue or else you will need to speak to him again.
  • Travel to the Black Knights' Fortress west of Edgeville/north of Ice Mountain. (Amulet of glory or combat bracelet provide convenient teleports)
  • Equip the bronze med helm and iron chainbody, and enter the Black Knights' Fortress through the Sturdy door on the south wall.
  • Equip full black armour and push the wall to the north.
  • Climb down the ladder.
  • Free King Arthur from his statue (requires the granite).
  • Talk to King Arthur to give him the bronze med helm and iron chainbody.
  • Return to Camelot and speak to King Arthur in the castle by the round table.

Quest Complete!

Rewards[edit | edit source]

  • 1 Quest point
  • 33,000 experience
  • 5,000 experience
  • Antique lamp granting 5,000 experience to any skill level 50 or above
  • Access to the Knight Waves Training Grounds
  • The ability to use the Chivalry and Piety prayers, with level 60 and 70 Prayer, respectively, after completion of Knight Waves Training Grounds
v • d • e

==Details==
{{Quest details page|King's Ransom}}

==Walkthrough==
===Sinclair's Mansion===
{{Checklist|
''Grab all the required items at the start. You do not have to make bank trips during this quest.''
*Speak with [[Gossip]] outside of [[Sinclair Mansion]]. {{Chat option|1}}
*Speak with the guard in the courtyard to the north.
*Break into the Smashed Window on the East side of the mansion.
*Grab the [[Scrap paper]] in the dining room next to the fire place ({{FloorNumber|uk=0}}).
*Go up the stairs to the {{FloorNumber|uk=1}} and then to the library in the centre.
*Take the [[Address Form]] off the table and read it.
*Search the bookcase on the Western wall for a Black knight helm.
*Return to the guard via the smashed window.
*Speak to him, using all three options so that he takes each of your three items
*Speak with the Gossip using all three options.
}}

===Anna's Trial===
{{Checklist|
*Travel south to the Seer's Village courthouse. (South-East of the bank).
*Speak to Anna. {{Chat option|1}}
*Walk down the stairs to begin the trial.
''For this part you need to speak to the Judge in order to call next witness and then speak to the witnesses to ask them questions.''
*Call the Dog Handler as a witness. Ask him about the '''poison'''.
*Call the Butler as a witness by speaking to the judge. Ask him about the '''dagger'''.
*Call the Maid as a witness. Ask her about '''the night of the murder'''.
*Ask the Maid (or anyone else) about the '''thread'''.
''(If done correctly Anna should be pronounced '''not guilty''' and balloons will fall.)''
*Exit the courtroom by clicking on the gate.
*Speak again with Anna in her cell.
}}

===Camelot Castle's Prison===
''Items needed: Telekinetic grab runes''{{Checklist|
*Head east around [[Camelot Castle]], past the gate and to the north-east. Search the statue to start a cutscene.
'''''Clicking anywhere will end the cutscene and you will need to go through it again.'''''
*Speak with [[Merlin]] inside the cell. {{Chat option|3What do we do now?}}
*Reach for the vent at the north of the cell.
*Use [[Telekinetic Grab]] on the guard fixing his hair outside the cell
**You can speak to the knights in the cell to receive a lockpick or runes for telekinetic grab.
*Use the [[Hair clip]] or lockpick on the door to start a puzzle.
**To complete this puzzle, you must set each of four tumblers to the correct height. The most foolproof way to do this (not necessarily the quickest) is to set all tumblers to the lowest height, and try the lock. If a tumbler shows a green circle, do not change that tumbler anymore (red and blue circles can be ignored). Increase the height by one on each other tumbler and try again. Continue until the lock unlocks. This method will take at most six attempts.
*Climb up the staircases until you reach the top floor.
*Search the table.
*Choose the round purple box second from the right.
}}

===Black Knights' Fortress===
''Items needed: bronze med helm, iron chainbody, full black armour, granite, holy grail''{{Checklist|
*Talk to [[Wizard Cromperty]] in [[Ardougne]] to receive an [[Animate rock scroll]].
**You might already have the item in your bank from the quest [[One Small Favour]]. However, you must still talk to Cromperty. Be sure to go through all dialogue or else you will need to speak to him again.
*Travel to the [[Black Knights' Fortress (location)|Black Knights' Fortress]] west of [[Edgeville]]/north of [[Ice Mountain]]. (Amulet of glory or combat bracelet provide convenient teleports)
*Equip the [[bronze med helm]] and [[iron chainbody]], and enter the Black Knights' Fortress through the Sturdy door on the south wall.
*Equip full [[black armour]] and push the wall to the north.
*Climb down the ladder.
*Free [[King Arthur]] from his statue (requires the [[granite]]).
*Talk to King Arthur to give him the bronze med helm and iron chainbody.
*Return to Camelot and speak to King Arthur in the castle by the round table.}}
'''Quest Complete!'''
